Guys just follow these steps.
After downloading the torrent,
1) Download and install "daemon tools"
(you can delete it after the game is installed)
2) Mount the .mds file inside the downloaded torrent.
3) Install
3) Download the crack from

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5418727/Major_League_Baseball_2K10-RELOADED_Crack_Only

4) Copy paste the crack files into the main directory of the installed game. (in local disk>program files>2k Sports)

5) start game

Works PERFECTLY.
So shut up and follow the steps properly

@people saying it does work with Windows 7 x64 and this is the x86 version, lol @ game manufactures making separate versions.  It works fine on Windows 7 x64 for me, so user error.  Follow the instructions EXACTLY ie use daemon tools and you will have no issue.

I use an Xbox 360 wired controller.  Since it's made by Microsoft, the drivers are native in Windows, and 2K games recognize them as such and set them up the same as they are for their games on the 360.

@seanmcintier and Deputy276 mds is not an odd file format.  And it isn't a new file format.  It's well known that Alcohol (application it is native to) and Daemon Tools can handle these files.  You are both idiots.  Where are your game uploads?  Ex-fucking-actly.
